attributes.action: Create minimum requirements for prospective MPs to stand for election
attributes.background: The minimum requirement to stand for election as an MP should be that the proposed candidate would have spent at least 2 years working in the NHS/education/police/military/emergency services or ran a successful business employing 10 people for 10 years.

rejection.details: The selection of candidates to stand for parliament is the responsibility of political parties and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
